column5: That is my favorite Christmas movie, and one of the best parts of the movie!
i agree with gcd, that is my favorite christmas movie, i think alot of people can relate a little to christmas vacation at one time or another.  jason
Thanks Harry, it's one of my favorites too, a real classic !!  Infact, it's on at 8:00 tonite on Rogers channel 6
Was in Hawaii last month and said that to the tour bus driver. Boy was she floored at that. Hilarious!! She asked me if I knew what that meant, I said sure, didnt you watch the movie?
Awesome.   I love that movie.      The Rant is the best as well.  " I want Frank Shirley right here in my kitchen so I can tell him........
